thread.title: Modern Hip Hotel Close to Brick Lane
thread.title_full: Modern Hip Hotel Close to Brick Lane - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cheekymonkeyParis
title: Modern Hip Hotel Close to Brick Lane
text:
The lobby and bar area is very spacious and stylish, great for business gatherings or meeting up with friends. It is only a block from the tube and Brick Lane.
The rooms have an espresso machine and a mini fridge. There was a large walk in shower in the bathroom The only thing I found as a short (5'1') woman wrong was that the sink was quite high and awkward to use. The room was comfortable and quiet but for some reason there was a bluish nightlight by the front door that didn't seem to have a way to shut off. So if a completely dark room is necessary for sleep maybe they have rooms without that feature. We only stayed one night so didn't ask.
